exercise.name: Russian Twist
exercise.description: Sit upright on the floor with legs slightly bent and turn the upper torso to the left and then to the right

exercise.name: Crunches
exercise.description: The crunches begins lying on your back with your legs bent at the knees. The torso bent so that the shoulders are close to the pelvis

exercise.name: Scizzors
exercise.description: Scissors -lying on your back, raising both legs off of the ground, then criss-crossing one over the other

exercise.name: Bicycle Crunches
exercise.description: you lie on your back and use your legs to simulate cycling

exercise.name: Squats
exercise.description: You must straddle shoulder width apart and then go into a squat so that you don't lift your heels off the ground

exercise.name: Sumo squats
exercise.description: you must straddle a width greater than the width of your shoulders and then perform a squat while keeping your heels on the ground
